articles.author: Katie Wadington
articles.title: Government shutdown impacts: air travel to taxes, national security to national parks - The Hill
articles.description: How would a government shutdown affect the lives of everyday Americans? Some benefits, like Social Security and those for veterans, go on unimpeded. But other services, such as assistance at the IRS or access to national parks, will come to a halt. Federal em…
